poem:
**Nourished by Sound**

In the newspaper's crisp folds,  
the story of Nourished by Time unfolds,  
where voice warm as a hearth,  
dances atop a symphony of keys,  
each note a step in subliminal rhythm,  
samples slipping like dreams dissolving—  
here, passion spills,  
word by word, key by key,  
a sonic embrace in the numbered world.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "The 50 best albums of 2025 default "> *** 50-41 *** 50 Nourished by Time – The Passionate Ones Marcus Elliot Brown, AKA one-man project Nourished By Time, has a classic R&B singing voice in the style of Freddie Jackson or Luther Vandross: warm, earnest and with every word enunciated as if to express his keenness of feeling. But his music is quite different: a slippery layer cake of samples, multitudinous keys and lo-fi pop". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: The 50 best albums of 2025 default "> *** 50-41 *** 50 Nourished by Time – The Passionate Ones Marcus Elliot Brown, AKA one-man project Nourished By Time, has a classic R&B singing voice in the style of Freddie Jackson or Luther Vandross: warm, earnest and with every word enunciated as if to express his keenness of feeling. But his music is quite different: a slippery layer cake of samples, multitudinous keys and lo-fi pop
